title: SpanNearQuery add setMinimumNumberShouldMatch method
description:
For long string query.
Sometimes need BooleanQuery.setMinimumNumberShouldMatch to relax match condition.
But it cannot limit match positions. SpanNearQuery can achieve this.
Can SpanNearQuery add setMinimumNumberShouldMatch method to relax SpanTermQuery match?

comments.content: Closing as a duplicate... this was reported first; however there is more interesting discussion & a patch at LUCENE-7434 now so it doesn't make sense to close that one.
comments.author: David Smiley
